# Historic Achievements/Codex This guide will explain the Historic Achievements and Codex system.
## Historic Achievements The powerful instituions that control migration into the Threshold are relying on the colonists to develop the region. As the infrastructure and amenities of the Threshold improve it will become possible for us to explore further down the Threshold.
The Historic Achievements system is used by the most powerful and knowledgable stake-holders to set objectives for the colonists in the Threshold to complete. These objectives will sometimes have powerful rewards and effects on the entire region when they are completed. Your job network implant has a section displays historic achievements which includes the historic achievements that are currently available to complete and past achievements. Every historic achievement that has bbeen completed will be remembered here, including details on the people who completed it.
## Threshold Codex The Threshold is an incredibly mysterious region of space and so the Threshold Codex was developed to help colonists keep track of the facts that have been discovered about the Threshold. Some codex entries are available to all colonists and other entries are only unlocked by those who actively seek knowledge about the Threshold. Codex entries can be unlocked through a wide variety of methods including unlocking historic achievements.
